mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATCH_APPLICATION (APPLY_NO, HOME_TEAM, AWAY_TEAM, MEMBER_NO, FIELD_NO, APPLY_NAME, APPLY_PHONE, APPLY_CONTENT, MATCH_TIME, MATCH_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_MANO.NEXTVAL, #{homeTeam}, #{awayTeam}, #{memberNo}, #{fieldNo}, #{applyName}, #{applyPhone}, #{applyContent}, #{matchTime}, TO_DATE(#{matchDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'))
